typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	fileSystem: 'raw',
	folderPath: 'ecdc/cases_deaths',
	fileName: 'cases_deaths.csv',
	columnDelimiter: '\t',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	quoteChar: '\"',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
